subject: Feedback on product
body: Great product! Would love to see more features.
response: Thank you for your feedback! We are glad to hear that you are enjoying our product. Your suggestion for more features has been noted and will be passed on to the relevant team for consideration. We appreciate your support and hope to continue exceeding your expectations.

subject: Feedback on product
